author: Nicole Blackmore
title: 'We built an extension and our council tax went from £2,416 to £3,531'
text: Household bills 'We built an extension and our council tax went from £2,416 to £3,531' Residents that adapt their home to cater for extended family or those in old age are being hit hard by huge council tax rises Shirley and Brian Couch outside their East Sussex home. Photo: Philip Hollis
